data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Monema Walker in China (Lepidoptera, Limacodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pan, Zhaohui, Zhu, Chaodong, Wu, Chunsheng (2013): A review of the genus Monema Walker in China (Lepidoptera, Limacodidae). ZooKeys 306: 23-36, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.306.5216, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.306.5216
